data.actual_result: You don't see your current game and are unable to remove it
data.expected_result: You should see your current game and be able to remove it
data.short_description: Currently running games don't show up under Added Games in Game Activity
data.steps_to_repro: - Start playing any game, or manually add a game - Go into Game Activity in user settings - Observe your playing status - Look through your added games for the game you're currently playing
